column1: siddhe bindau mahāyatne kim na sidhyati bhūtale
datte ca siddhihāniḥ syāt satyam vacmi ca caṇḍa te
bahunā kim ihoktena sāram vacmi ca caṇḍa te
kumbhake kevale siddhe kim na sidhyati bhūtale
aham brahma na cānyo 'smi brahmaivāham na śokabhāk
cakṣuḥ sūryo diśaḥ śrotre candramāḥ pātu te manaḥ
nakṣatrāṇi sadā rūpam chāyām pāntu niśāstava
etā dehe viśeṣeṇa tava nityā hi devatāḥ
tasmin sarvaśarīrāvayavadoṣadhātumalāśayānusāriṇi rase jijñāsā kimayam saumyastaijasa iti
